title: What’s New: Same-Week New Diagnosis Navigation Calls
excerpt: Patients with new diagnoses can now receive a navigation call during the same week to clarify next steps before first visit.
content: We introduced same-week navigator outreach for new diagnosis pathways to reduce uncertainty before first consultation.
author: Care Navigation Team
seoTitle: Same-Week Navigation Calls for New Diagnosis
seoDescription: Same-week navigation calls now available for new diagnosis pathways.

title: Article: How Multidisciplinary Tumor Boards Improve Treatment Decisions
excerpt: A practical overview of how multidisciplinary tumor boards align specialties and improve decision quality in complex oncology care.
content:
Why Tumor Boards Matter

Tumor boards bring oncology, surgery, radiology, pathology, and supportive care together to review cases from multiple angles.

This structure helps reduce variation and improves treatment sequencing decisions.
author: Dr. Sarah Chen
seoTitle: How Tumor Boards Improve Treatment Decisions
seoDescription: Understand how multidisciplinary review improves treatment quality for complex oncology cases.

title: What’s New: Extended Evening Infusion Slots
excerpt: Infusion unit scheduling now includes additional evening slots on selected weekdays to improve flexibility.
content: To support patient access, selected infusion sessions are now available in extended evening windows based on treatment protocol suitability.
author: Infusion Services
seoDescription: Evening infusion slots added to improve treatment scheduling flexibility.

title: Comprehensive Cancer Center Expands Precision Oncology Program
excerpt: Our multidisciplinary team added advanced biomarker profiling pathways to improve treatment matching and reduce time to therapy decisions.
content:
Program Expansion

The center has expanded precision oncology capabilities with broader biomarker and molecular profiling workflows.

This update supports earlier treatment alignment and stronger multidisciplinary planning for complex oncology cases.
author: Clinical Communications Team
seoTitle: Precision Oncology Program Expansion | Comprehensive Cancer Center
seoDescription: Comprehensive Cancer Center expands precision oncology capabilities with advanced biomarker profiling and faster treatment planning.

title: What’s New: Updated Contact Center Routing
excerpt: Contact requests are now routed by care intent to reduce wait time and direct patients faster to the right team.
content: Routing improvements now classify requests by clinical intent, helping patients connect to the right pathway with fewer handoffs.
author: Operations Team
seoDescription: New request routing improves first-response direction and lowers delays.

title: New Integrated Survivorship Clinic Launches This Quarter
excerpt: The new clinic combines oncology follow-up, nutrition, psycho-oncology, and rehabilitation planning in one coordinated pathway.
content:
What Patients Can Expect

Survivorship pathways now include coordinated follow-up, symptom management, and wellness planning from a single care team.

  • Nutrition support
  • Psycho-oncology referrals
  • Rehabilitation planning
author: Patient Experience Office
seoDescription: Comprehensive survivorship care now available through a coordinated clinic model.

title: Article: Preparing for Your First Oncology Consultation
excerpt: A checklist for patients and families to make first consultations more focused and productive.
content:
Before Your Visit

  • Bring all relevant reports
  • List current medications
  • Prepare key questions and priorities

Structured preparation helps your care team build a clearer plan faster.
author: Patient Education Desk
seoTitle: Preparing for Your First Oncology Consultation
seoDescription: A patient-friendly checklist for first oncology appointments.

title: Article: Understanding Supportive Care During Active Treatment
excerpt: Supportive care is more than symptom relief. It strengthens treatment tolerance, recovery, and quality of life.
content:
Supportive Care Scope

Supportive care includes symptom management, nutrition, psychological support, and rehabilitation planning during active treatment.
author: Supportive Care Unit
seoDescription: Learn how supportive care improves treatment tolerance and outcomes.

title: Radiation Planning Workflow Updated for Faster Turnaround
excerpt: Updated treatment simulation and planning workflows now reduce the average planning cycle for eligible cases.
content:
Operational Improvement

Radiation planning teams implemented new workflow checkpoints to shorten planning windows while preserving quality controls.
author: Radiation Oncology Unit
seoDescription: Faster radiation planning workflow now active for eligible patient pathways.
